detail_desc: Narrow metal Alice band with faceted sparkly stones on top.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in a soft viscose weave. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long, cuffed sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in stretch jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Elasticated waist with a decorative tie detail at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.

Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a glittery text print on the front, a jersey-lined hood and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Front, back and leg pockets and a hammer loop on one leg.
Ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Front, back and leg pockets and a hammer loop on one leg.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in a fine jacquard knit with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Long-sleeved body in soft velour. Deep V-neck with a knot detail at the front for a draping effect, a seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press studs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with cut-off, raw edges.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with cut-off, raw edges.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with cut-off, raw edges.
Long-sleeved romper suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved romper suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cycling shorts in stretch nylon jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication.
Cycling shorts in stretch nylon jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Lightweight jacket in soft, sequined velour. Zip down the front with a circular tab, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in rib-knit chenille with dropped shoulders. No buttons.
One-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit with a shoulder strap, long sleeves and ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on jeans in soft, superstretch denim with jersey ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with a decorative button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Pull-on jeans in soft, superstretch denim with jersey ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with a decorative button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Metal rings in various designs.
Metal rings in various designs.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes along the short sides.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes along the short sides.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
